text_a: The system shall store all data locally on the user's device.
text_b: All user data must be stored in a cloud-based database.
conflict_description: Conflict between local-only and cloud-only storage requirements.

text_a: Users can login with email and password.
text_b: Users can also login with their phone number.

text_a: The system shall respond to any request within 1 second.
text_b: The system shall validate each request against 5 external APIs before processing.
conflict_description: Calling 5 external APIs will likely exceed the 1-second response time constraint.

text_a: The system shall support English and Spanish languages.
text_b: The system shall support English, Spanish, and French.

text_a: All user sessions shall expire after 15 minutes of inactivity.
text_b: Users shall remain logged in for 24 hours without re-authentication.

text_a: The system shall encrypt data at rest using AES-256.
text_b: The system shall also encrypt data in transit using TLS 1.3.

text_a: The system shall be available 99.99% of the time.
text_b: The system shall undergo a 4-hour maintenance window every night.
conflict_description: Nightly 4-hour downtime makes 99.99% uptime impossible (allows only 52.6 min/year).

text_a: The search shall return results within 500 milliseconds.
text_b: The search shall also check spelling and suggest corrections.

text_a: The system shall retain all logs indefinitely for audit purposes.
text_b: The system shall automatically delete all logs older than 30 days to comply with GDPR.
conflict_description: Indefinite retention conflicts with 30-day deletion requirement.

text_a: Admin users can create new accounts.
text_b: Admin users can also deactivate existing accounts.

text_a: The system shall allow anonymous user access without login.
text_b: All system access requires authentication via SSO.
conflict_description: Anonymous access contradicts mandatory SSO authentication.

text_a: The system shall support file uploads up to 10MB.
text_b: The system shall support file uploads up to 50MB for premium users.

text_a: The system shall use a NoSQL database for all data storage.
text_b: All financial transactions must be stored in a relational database with ACID compliance.
conflict_description: NoSQL-only storage conflicts with ACID-compliant relational DB requirement for transactions.

text_a: The API shall use JSON format for all requests and responses.
text_b: The API shall also support XML format for legacy integrations.

text_a: Passwords shall never be stored in the system.
text_b: The system shall compare entered passwords against stored hashes.
conflict_description: Cannot compare against stored hashes if passwords are never stored in any form.

text_a: The system shall send email notifications for all events.
text_b: The system shall also send push notifications for critical events.

text_a: The application shall run entirely offline without internet.
text_b: The system shall validate licenses via an online activation server.
conflict_description: Offline-only operation conflicts with online license validation.

text_a: The system shall support pagination with 20 items per page.
text_b: The system shall support pagination with 10 or 50 items per page as user preference.

text_a: All data processing shall occur on the client side.
text_b: All data shall be validated and processed on the server before storage.
conflict_description: Client-side only processing contradicts server-side processing requirement.

text_a: The system shall support both dark and light themes.
text_b: The system shall allow users to customize the color scheme.

text_a: The system shall use single sign-on (SSO) as the only authentication method.
text_b: The system shall support local username/password authentication for offline scenarios.
conflict_description: SSO-only conflicts with local authentication requirement.

text_a: The system shall log all API requests with full request body.
text_b: The system shall never log personally identifiable information (PII).
conflict_description: Logging full request bodies will inevitably include PII data.

text_a: The system shall support up to 1000 concurrent users.
text_b: The system shall support up to 5000 concurrent users during peak hours.

text_a: Users shall be able to export their data in CSV format.
text_b: Users shall be able to export their data in CSV and PDF formats.

text_a: The system shall automatically delete inactive accounts after 90 days.
text_b: The system shall retain all user data indefinitely for compliance.
conflict_description: Auto-deletion after 90 days conflicts with indefinite data retention.

text_a: The system shall enforce MFA for all users.
text_b: Guest users shall access the public dashboard without authentication.
conflict_description: Mandatory MFA for all users conflicts with unauthenticated guest access.

text_a: The report shall be generated in real-time.
text_b: The report shall be generated as a background batch job overnight.
conflict_description: Real-time generation conflicts with overnight batch processing.

text_a: The system shall support both metric and imperial units.
text_b: The system shall display measurements in metric units only.
conflict_description: Supporting both unit systems conflicts with metric-only display.

text_a: The API rate limit shall be 100 requests per minute per user.
text_b: Premium users shall have unlimited API access.

text_a: The system shall compress all images before storage.
text_b: The system shall store original unmodified images for legal compliance.
conflict_description: Compression modifies images, conflicting with unmodified storage requirement.
